\fi

% for {,e}uptex

\catcode"153=11 % œ

\catcode"133=11 % ĳ
\catcode"237=11 % ȷ

\catcode"F0=11  % ð
\catcode"110=11 % Đ
\catcode"111=11 % đ
\catcode"2018=12 % ‘
\catcode"2019=12 % ’
\catcode"201C=12 % “
\catcode"201D=12 % ”
\catcode"2039=12 % ‹
\catcode"203A=12 % ›

\catcode"BB=12  % »
\catcode"2423=12 % ␣
